api_list.name: Get country by ISO alpha 3 code
api_list.description: Get country by ISO alpha 3 code

api_list.name: Get country by ISO alpha 2 code
api_list.description: Get country by ISO alpha 2 code.

api_list.name: Get country by country name
api_list.description: Get country code given the name of the country.

api_list.name: Get country subdivisions
api_list.description: Get all country subdivisions given the two-letter country code
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://country-codes4.p.rapidapi.com/country-codes/DE/subdivisions"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "country-codes4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://country-codes4.p.rapidapi.com/country-codes/{iso2code}/subdivisions"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "country-codes4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
